effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 588,454 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 252,151.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,229, further increased by 848 while you remain within its light.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,086, up to 10,432.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.4 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
